Prepare package for publishing to pub.dev

- Fix all dependency constraints (window_manager, super_editor, follow_the_leader, overlord)
- Fix analyzer issues:

  - Remove unnecessary library names from lib_colour and lib_moment
  - Rename constants to follow lowerCamelCase convention (MMMM -> mmmm, DDDD -> dateNumeric)
